snippet: Prime Minister Dmitri A. Medvedev fired the general director of Russia’s space agency on Thursday as part of a shake-up that had been expected after embarrassing rocket failures.
abstract: Russian Prime Min Dmitri A Medvedev fires Vladimir A Popovkin, general director of beleaguered space agency Roscosmos, after series of embarrassing rocket failures; Oleg Ostapenko, deputy defense minister with long experience in space operations, will replace him.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Dmitri A. Medvedev fired the general director of Russia’s space agency on Thursday as part of a shake-up that had been expected after embarrassing rocket failures.
